loading.title: Loading
loading.description: Fetching the current status of the access point...

success.title: Applying changes...
success.description: Please ask NetFire staff to check connectivity to the device. If you need to make any port changes or other network config changes, you may do so now.

shutdown.title: Access point is shutting down
shutdown.description: The access point has timed out and is now shutting down. Power cycle the device to restart it.

countdown.message: Access point will shut down in {{seconds}} seconds.
countdown.hint: Power cycle the device to restart the countdown.

reset.heading: Click the below button to reset this device's network settings to DHCP. Any static IP settings will be lost.
